main.name: Louie Tse
main.description: Recent Graduate | Software Developer | Java | Javascript | ReactJS | Jenkins | Servoy | GIT / SVN | Photoshop | CompTIA A+ | CCNA
main.bio: I love working on projects on Github, having learnt GIT has been a huge boon to my coding productivity. Utilizing GIT to start, and contribute to others' projects, I can say that GIT is my preferred tool for version control system.
main.bio2: I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from image editing(Photoshop), to design(HTML + CSS + Javascript), to component creation(React) all the way to deployment on a VM.
